texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over the Christmas and New Year period, most of TfL public transport is open. However, planned works and service changes will affect public transport and road travel."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
See our Status updates map for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and London Trams services for 27 December.
There are changes and planned works on the following services today.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Day routes - Saturday service","24-hour and night routes - normal weekday service"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/bus/route/507/?direction=outbound\"\u003e507\u003c/a\u003e route - enhanced Saturday service"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/bus/route/521/?direction=outbound\"\u003e521\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/bus/route/68/?direction=outbound\"\u003eX68\u003c/a\u003e - special service"]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Saturday service on all lines except Waterloo \u0026 City line","First trains at weekday times","No District line service between Earl's Court and Kensington (Olympia)","Waterloo \u0026 City line - reduced service with first and last trains at weekday times","Central line - first trains between Hainault and Woodford via Grange Hill at Saturday times","Night Tube running as normal"]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Weekday service between Highbury \u0026 Islington/Dalston Junction and New Cross, Clapham Junction, Crystal Palace and West Croydon","Friday Night Service trains will not stop at Whitechapel","Saturday service on all other routes"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Saturday service between Liverpool Street and Shenfield","Trains run every 10 minutes between Stratford and Shenfield"]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service between Paddington and slough/Heathrow Terminal 4","Rail replacement buses running between Ealing Broadway, Slough and Hillingdon (not stopping at Acton Main Line, West Ealing and Hanwell)","Services continue to run between Slough and Reading","Transfer service between Heathrow terminals"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Limited regular bookings for today. Book your journeys for today from Friday 13 December","Dial-a-Ride services are for registered members only"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Black cabs will charge an extra £4 per journey","There may be an extra charge for private hire vehicles (including minicabs) - check when you book"]}
Santander Cycles are available throughout December, including today.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Cycle for free this December. Make as many 30-minute journeys as you like within 24 hours free of charge. Use code SCXMAS19","Check availability of Santander Cycles using the \u003ca href=\"/modes/cycling/santander-cycles/find-a-docking-station\"\u003eonline docking station map\u003c/a\u003e ","Download the Santander Cycles app from the \u003ca href=\"https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/santander-cycles/id974792287?mt=8\"\u003eApp Store\u003c/a\u003e or \u003ca href=\"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.gov.tfl.cyclehire\u0026hl=en_GB\"\u003eGoogle Play\u003c/a\u003e "]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/congestion-charge\"\u003eCongestion Charge\u003c/a\u003e does not apply today. Charges resume on Thursday 2 January"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/ultra-low-emission-zone\"\u003eULEZ charges\u003c/a\u003e apply today","See our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future%20date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2019-12-27T00%3A00%3A00\u0026endDate=2019-12-27T23%3A59%3A59\"\u003etraffic status updates map\u003c/a\u003e for 23 December"]}
All our other services are planned to run normally.
